function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependency on global value chains (GVCs) for essential supplies and production processes","Impact":"Disruptions in production and trade, shortages of essential supplies like PPE and medical devices","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply sources, stockpiling of essential supplies, onshoring critical production processes","Technologies":"Supply chain analytics, inventory management systems, automation for onshoring","People":"Global manufacturers, businesses, and countries reliant on GVCs","Owner":"Global manufacturers, businesses, and countries reliant on GVCs"},{"Description":"Increased vulnerability to global shocks due to international specialisation in GVCs","Impact":"Instability, disruption of production, and trade due to global shocks such as pandemics and public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Risk diversification, scenario planning, development of domestic capabilities","Technologies":"Risk assessment and management software, predictive modeling, domestic production technology","People":"Businesses, countries, and workers involved in international specialisation","Owner":"Businesses, countries, and workers involved in international specialisation"}]}
